abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Clarkia purpurea (Curtis) A.Nelson & J.F.Macbr." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbario de la Facultad de Farmacia de la Universidad Complutense de Madrid (MAF) 1 records from Herbario de la Universidad de Sevilla, SEV-Historico 1 records from Botanical Museum, Copenhagen. Database of type specimens 1 records from Herbarium Berolinense, Berlin (B) 1 records from United States National Plant Germplasm System Collection 1 records from Colorado State University Herbarium 1 records from Herbarium of University of Coimbra (COI ) 1 records from Lund Botanical Museum (LD) 1 records from Meise Botanic Garden Herbarium (BR) 1 records from Seed collection – dead seeds for evaluation and observation purposes 1 records from Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh Herbarium (E) 1 records from Michigan State University Herbarium Vascular Plants 1 records from Botany (UPS) 1 records from Plant Resources Center 1 records from CEN - Herbário da Embrapa Recursos Genéticos e Biotecnologia 1 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium, Oslo (O) UiO 1 records from South Dakota State University, C. A. Taylor Herbarium 1 records from University of Graz, Institute of Plant Sciences - Herbarium GZU 1 records from PACA-AGP - Herbarium Anchieta 1 records from Olga Lakela Herbarium, University of Minnesota Duluth 1 records from Sistematización de la colección entomológica y actualización de la colección del herbario CHIP del Instituto de Historia Natural y Ecología (IHNE), Chiapas (Plantas) 1 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Palynology Collection 1 records from Catálogo electrónico de especímenes depositados en el Herbario de la Universidad de Texas en Austin, Fase IV (Ejemplaresimagenes) 1 records from El banco de datos del Herbario HCIB en línea (Fase I): Implementación del Sistema Biótica 1 records from 500,000 plant Specimens from PE Herbarium in China from 1950 to 1999 1 records from MBM - Herbário do Museu Botânico Municipal 1 records from Manchester Museum, University of Manchester, Botany Collection 1 records from Natural History Museum Maastricht (NL) - Herbarium 1 records from LSU Shirley C. Tucker Herbarium at Louisiana State University - Vascular Plants 1 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) - Historical Photographs of Type Specimens from Berlin (B) 1 records from Taxon occurrence data for the FungalRoot database 1 records from The Fungal Collection at the Senckenberg Museum für Naturkunde Görlitz 1 records from The Vascular Plant Collection at the Botanische Staatssammlung München 1 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 2 records from Bell Museum plants 2 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 2 records from Sistematización del Herbario Nacional Forestal Biól Luciano Vela Gálvez 2 records from Clemson University Herbarium 2 records from IAC - Herbário do Instituto Agronômico de Campinas 2 records from Staten Island Museum 2 records from UCBG TAPIR Provider 2 records from CONN 2 records from Sammlung altes Gartenherbar Herbarium Hamburgense HBG 3 records from Auckland Museum Botany Collection 3 records from Jardin Botanique de Lyon 3 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 3 records from University of Michigan Herbarium 3 records from INSDC Sequences 3 records from RB - Rio de Janeiro Botanical Garden Herbarium Collection 3 records from North Carolina State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 4 records from University of South Carolina, A.
